name: Laberinto
overview: The game introduces us to our character, who, invited by a friend of your father, challenges us to enter his own labyrinth in order to overcome his own test and escape from it alive. To do this, we place ourselves in a position on the map, already inside the labyrinth, from which we will only see the adjoining rooms (we recommend that you make a map) and we will advance. Along the way you will come across different aids or tests and you will have to overcome them, one by one, until you exit the maze.
